title: Chikyuu ga Ugoita Hi (The Day the Earth Moved)
synopsis: Tsuyoshi Takahashi, a 6th grader, lived in eastern Kobe with his parents and younger brother. Tsuyoshi was very ambitious and hoped to enter a prestigious private school, so his days were filled with study. Whenever asked by anyone for a favor, Tsuyoshi resented having to give up his free time.
staff: [['Katsura, Souzaburou', ['Producer', ' Planning']], ['Tanaka, Michiya', ['Producer']], ['Gotou, Toshio', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard']], ['Aketagawa, Susumu', ['Sound Director']]]
